data.name: MAGIX Video deluxe 2017 Plus Steam Edition
data.detailed_description:
New Version

https://store.steampowered.com/app/922670/MAGIX_Video_deluxe_2019_Plus_Steam_Edition/


About the Software

Experience your games in a completely new dimension with MAGIX Movie Edit Pro Plus Steam Edition. Edit Let's Plays and Walkthroughs or submerge into a virtual world when editing your own 360-degree videos. You can then share your results with the whole world.

The most important features:

  • Frame-exact editing on up to 99 tracks
  • Smooth results for videos up to 4K thanks to proxy editing
  • MultiCam editing for up to 4 cameras
    Ideal for Let's Plays - show what you play and how you do it!
  • Perfect image stabilization thanks proDAD Mercalli V2
  • Over 1,500 templates, effects, transitions, intros/outros and music
  • Automatic video editing to match the beat of the music
  • Advanced audio dubbing in 5.1 Surround Sound
  • Share directly online on YouTube, Facebook and Vimeo

New in this version:


New Media Pool
Over 1,500 professional templates, effects and songs. Access a unique level of quality and variety. Find everything you need for a perfect film quickly and directly within the program.

Virtual Reality
You are center stage: After you've edited your 360-degree videos, share it directly on Facebook with your friends or on YouTube with your community.

The perfect look
Did you film two different scenes under different lighting conditions? No problem: With the Shot Match feature, your recordings are automatically normalized.

Expand effects section
You can now apply plug-ins from other providers directly from the Media Pool. This way you can easily expand your program with needed functions and effects.

New impressive video effects
Discover the new video effects from MAGIX Movie Edit Pro Plus Steam Edition and set highlights just where you want them: lens reflection, color curves, punch shapes, Gaussian blur and glare.

Vimeo – the Online Community
Share your videos directly from the program with the Vimeo worldwide community. The premium video platform avoids advertising and lets your video shine in HD quality. What are you waiting for?

data.short_description: Show the world your best gaming experiences. MAGIX Movie Edit Pro Plus Steam Edition offers all the functions and tools you need for your video projects. Edit your walkthroughs frame by frame on up to 99 tracks or capture exciting moments of triumph on Let's Play.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Russian, Swedish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1280 x 768
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal sound card
  • Additional Notes: Supported import formats Video: (DV-)AVI, HEVC/H.265*, M(2)TS, MJPEG, MKV, MOV, MPEG-1/2/4, MXV, VOB, WMV(HD) Audio: MIDI, MP3, OGG, Surround sound/5.1, WAV, WMA Image: BMP, GIF, JPEG, TGA, TIF Supported export formats Disc: DVD, Blu-ray Disc, AVCHD disc Video: (DV-)AVI, HEVC/H.265*, MJPEG, MOV, MPEG-1/2/4, MXV, WMV(HD) Audio: MP3, Surround sound/5.1, WAV Image: BMP, JPEG *HEVC encoding requires fee-based activation. MP3 export requires installation of Windows Media Player Version 10 or higher.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated, at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Multi-channel sound card recommended for surround sound editing
  • Additional Notes: Some advanced program functions demand more of your computer's processing power. To get the most from these functions, your system should at least meet the recommended requirements. Check your operating system’s control panel for technical information about your computer.
